short_summary: event management services for  the annual Canadian congress on disability inclusion
description: employment and social development canada, employment and social development canada has a requirement for hybrid (virtual and in-person) event management services for the annual Canadian Congress on Disability inclusion as described in the annex b , statement of work on may 26 to 27,2022, the first annual CCDI was hosted the Theme was innovating together celebrating and driving disability inclusion in canada this virtual,interactive  and inclusive event over 4,000 registrants and over 2,000 attendees future event will have increased registration and attendance
duration_in_months: With one (1) year, plus four (4) one-year option periods
tags: Canada - European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
